metadata.title: CVE-2024-24861 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/xc4000 device driverin xc4000 xc4000_get_frequency() function. This can result in return valueoverflow issue, possibly leading to malfunction or denial of service issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic-64k - 6.8.0-35.35
No subscription required

No subscription required
